sentences: He appears on the band's 1977 self-titled debut album, as well as their second album, Quiet Riot II.
Born in Los Angeles in 1957, Garni's family moved to Burbank, California in the early 1970s, where he met Randy Rhoads.
He played bass with Quiet Riot for about five years until he was fired for a drunk episode where he plotted to kill lead singer Kevin DuBrow.
